pages.text: New enchantments available for various weapons.

pages.title: Attuned Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Reduces the mana cost of spells cast by scepters.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3$(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Common$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None

pages.title: Cleaving Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Adds damage to the enchanted axe and disables the opponents shield.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Axe$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Common$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None

pages.title: Contaminated Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Your attack poisons the target.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Any weapon$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Very Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Flame, Fire Aspect, Wasting, Decayed

pages.title: Deadly Shot Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Increases the projectile speed of Crossbows and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:weapons/sniper_bow)Sniper bows.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Crossbow, Sniper Bow$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Common$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None

pages.title: Decayed Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Your attack withers the target.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Any weapon$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Very Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Flame, Fire Aspect, Wasting, Contaminated

pages.title: Heroic Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Increases damage against illagers.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Swords and Axes$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 7 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Uncommon$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Sharpness, Smite, Bane of Arthropods

pages.title: Insight Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Increases experience dropped by slain enemies.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Any weapon$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Common$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None

pages.title: Lifesteal Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Dealing damage to opponents heals you.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Any weapon$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None

pages.title: Puncturing Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Adds armor piercing damage to the weapon.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Crossbow, Sniper Bow, Tridents$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 6 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Piercing, Multishot, Impaling

pages.title: Rain of Thorns Enchant.
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() When an arrow hits a target, splinter arrows fly out from the target in random directions.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Bow$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Flame, Infinity

pages.title: Wasting Enchantment
pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Targets are slowed on hit.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(#490)Swords and Axes$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 4 $(br)$(l)Rarity:$() Rare$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() None
